trans-unit.target: 一个QProgressBar，吸引CE_ProgressBarGroove，CE_ProgressBarContents和CE_ProgressBarLabel。

trans-unit.source: A QProxyStyle wraps a QStyle (usually the default system style) for the purpose of dynamically overriding painting or other specific style behavior.
trans-unit.target: 一个QProxyStyle包装了一个将QStyle（通常默认的系统方式）针对动态覆盖绘画或其他特定样式的行为的目的。

trans-unit.source: A QPushButton instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个QPushButton实例。

trans-unit.source: A QPushButton, draws CE_PushButtonBevel, CE_PushButtonLabel and PE_FrameFocusRect.
trans-unit.target: 一个QPushButton，绘制CE_PushButtonBevel，CE_PushButtonLabel和PE_FrameFocusRect。

trans-unit.source: A QQmlComponent instance can be created from a QML file. For example, if there is a main.qml file like this:
trans-unit.target: 一个QQmlComponent实例可以从QML文件被创建。例如，如果有一个 main.qml 文件，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: A QQmlIncubationController derived instance should be created and set on a QQmlEngine by calling the QQmlEngine::setIncubationController() method. Processing is then controlled by calling the QQmlIncubationController::incubateFor() or QQmlIncubationController::incubateWhile() methods as dictated by the application's requirements.
trans-unit.target: 甲QQmlIncubationController派生的实例应被创建并在设置QQmlEngine通过调用QQmlEngine :: setIncubationController（）方法。然后，根据应用程序的要求，通过调用QQmlIncubationController :: incubateFor（）或QQmlIncubationController :: incubateWhile（）方法来控制处理。

trans-unit.source: A QQuickWindow always has a single invisible root item containing all of its content. To add items to this window, reparent the items to the contentItem or to an existing item in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 一个QQuickWindow总是有一个包含所有内容的一个无形的根项目。要将项目添加到此窗口，请将项目与contentItem或场景中的现有项目重新关联。

trans-unit.source: A QQuickWindow always has a single invisible root item. To add items to this window, reparent the items to the root item or to an existing item in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 一个QQuickWindow总有一个无形的根项目。要将项目添加到此窗口，请将项目与根项目或场景中的现有项目重新关联。

trans-unit.source: A QRadioButton instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个QRadioButton实例。

trans-unit.source: A QRadioButton is an option button that can be switched on (checked) or off (unchecked). Radio buttons typically present the user with a "one of many" choice. In a group of radio buttons, only one radio button at a time can be checked; if the user selects another button, the previously selected button is switched off.
trans-unit.target: 甲QRadioButton是一个选项按钮，可以在（选中）或关闭（未选中）进行切换。单选按钮通常向用户显示“多个”选项。在一组单选按钮中，一次只能检查一个单选按钮。如果用户选择另一个按钮，则先前选择的按钮将关闭。

trans-unit.source: A QRadioButton, draws a PE_IndicatorRadioButton, a CE_RadioButtonLabel and a PE_FrameFocusRect.
trans-unit.target: 一个QRadioButton，绘制PE_IndicatorRadioButton，一个CE_RadioButtonLabel和PE_FrameFocusRect。

trans-unit.source: A QRawFont object represents a single, physical instance of a given font in a given pixel size. I.e. in the typical case it represents a set of TrueType or OpenType font tables and uses a user specified pixel size to convert metrics into logical pixel units. It can be used in combination with the QGlyphRun class to draw specific glyph indexes at specific positions, and also have accessors to some relevant data in the physical font.
trans-unit.target: 甲QRawFont对象表示在给定的像素大小给定字体的单个物理实例。即，在典型情况下，它代表一组TrueType或OpenType字体表，并使用用户指定的像素大小将指标转换为逻辑像素单位。它可以与QGlyphRun类结合使用，以在特定位置绘制特定的字形索引，并且还可以访问物理字体中的某些相关数据。

trans-unit.source: A QRect can be constructed with a set of left, top, width and height integers, or from a QPoint and a QSize. The following code creates two identical rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 甲查阅QRect可以用一组左，上，宽度和高度的整数来构成，或从一个QPoint和QSIZE。以下代码创建两个相同的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A QRect specifying the page rectangle
trans-unit.target: 一个查阅QRect指定页的矩形

trans-unit.source: A QRect specifying the paper rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 甲查阅QRect指定纸张矩形。

trans-unit.source: A QRectF can be constructed with a set of left, top, width and height coordinates, or from a QPointF and a QSizeF. The following code creates two identical rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 甲QRectF可以用一组左，上，宽度和高度坐标的，或从一个被构造QPointF和QSizeF。以下代码创建两个相同的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A QRegularExpressionMatch object can be obtained by calling the QRegularExpression::match() function, or as a single result of a global match from a QRegularExpressionMatchIterator.
trans-unit.target: 甲QRegularExpressionMatch对象可以通过调用能够得到QRegularExpression ::匹配（）函数，或作为从全局匹配的单个结果QRegularExpressionMatchIterator。

trans-unit.source: A QRegularExpressionMatchIterator object is a forward only Java-like iterator; it can be obtained by calling the QRegularExpression::globalMatch() function. A new QRegularExpressionMatchIterator will be positioned before the first result. You can then call the hasNext() function to check if there are more results available; if so, the next() function will return the next result and advance the iterator.
trans-unit.target: 一个QRegularExpressionMatchIterator对象是一个只进类似Java的迭代器; 可以通过调用QRegularExpression :: globalMatch（）函数获得它。新的QRegularExpressionMatchIterator将位于第一个结果之前。然后可以调用hasNext（）函数来检查是否还有更多结果可用；如果是这样，则next（）函数将返回下一个结果并推进迭代器。

trans-unit.source: A QRemoteObjectDynamicReplica can be generated at runtime. To do so, you call QRemoteObjectNode::acquireDynamic(), passing in the Source name (a QString) as an argument. Dynamic replicas are a bit more verbose to use from C++, but do not require compilation. Dynamic replicas do not support initial property values, and do not support introspection until they have been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 甲QRemoteObjectDynamicReplica可以在运行时产生的。为此，您调用QRemoteObjectNode :: acquireDynamic（），并将源名称（QString）作为参数传递。动态副本在C ++中使用起来较为冗长，但不需要编译。动态副本不支持初始属性值，并且在初始化之前不支持自省。

trans-unit.source: A QRemoteObjectDynamicReplica can be generated at runtime. To do so, you call QRemoteObjectNode::acquireDynamic(), passing in the source name (a QString) as an argument. Dynamic replicas are a bit more verbose to use from C++, but they do not require compilation. Dynamic replicas do not support initial property values, or introspection until they have been initialized.

A QRemoteObjectNode does not have a url that other nodes can connect to, and thus is able to acquire replicas only. It is not able to share source objects (only QRemoteObjectHost and QRemoteObjectRegistryHost Nodes can share).
trans-unit.target: 一个QRemoteObjectNode没有一个网址，其他节点可以连接，从而能够获得唯一的副本。它不能共享源对象（只有QRemoteObjectHost和QRemoteObjectRegistryHost节点可以共享）。

trans-unit.source: A QRemoteObjectRegistryHost has the same capability that a QRemoteObjectHost has (which includes everything a QRemoteObjectNode supports), and in addition is the owner of the Registry. Any QRemoteObjectHost node that connects to this Node will have all of their Source objects made available by the Registry.
trans-unit.target: 甲QRemoteObjectRegistryHost具有相同的功能，一个QRemoteObjectHost具有（其包括一切QRemoteObjectNode载体），并且另外是注册表的所有者。连接到该节点的任何QRemoteObjectHost节点都将使注册表具有所有其Source对象。

trans-unit.source: A QResource can either be loaded with an absolute path, either treated as a file system rooted with a / character, or in resource notation rooted with a : character. A relative resource can also be opened which will be found in the list of paths returned by QDir::searchPaths().
trans-unit.target: 甲QResource可以被装载以绝对路径，无论是作为根与文件系统处理的 / 根与一个字符，或在资源表示法 : 字符。也可以打开一个相对资源，该资源将在QDir :: searchPaths（）返回的路径列表中找到。

trans-unit.source: A QResource that is representing a file will have data backing it, this data can possibly be compressed, in which case qUncompress() must be used to access the real data; this happens implicitly when accessed through a QFile. A QResource that is representing a directory will have only children and no data.
trans-unit.target: 甲QResource即代表文件将具有数据支持它，该数据可能被压缩，在这种情况下qUncompress（）必须被用于访问实际数据; 通过QFile访问时隐式发生这种情况。一个QResource所代表的目录将只有孩子，没有数据。

trans-unit.source: A QRubberBand can represent a rectangle. Some styles will interpret this as a filled (often semi-transparent) rectangle, or a rectangular outline.
trans-unit.target: 甲QRubberBand可以代表一个矩形。某些样式会将其解释为实心（通常是半透明）矩形或矩形轮廓。

trans-unit.source: A QRubberBand can represent a vertical or horizontal line. Geometry is still given in rect() and the line will fill the given geometry on most styles.
trans-unit.target: 甲QRubberBand可以表示垂直或水平线。几何仍然在rect（）中给出，并且该行将填充大多数样式上的给定几何。

trans-unit.source: A QRubberBand::Shape enum value that holds the shape of the band (which is either a rectangle or a line).
trans-unit.target: 一个QRubberBand :: Shape枚举值，该值保留带的形状（矩形或直线）。

trans-unit.source: A QScopedArrayPointer is a QScopedPointer that defaults to deleting the object it is pointing to with the delete[] operator. It also features operator[] for convenience, so we can write:
trans-unit.target: 甲QScopedArrayPointer是QScopedPointer默认为删除对象它指向与删除[]操作符。为了方便起见，它还具有operator []功能，因此我们可以编写：

trans-unit.source: A QSemaphoreReleaser can be canceled by a call to cancel(). A canceled semaphore releaser will no longer call QSemaphore::release() in its destructor.
trans-unit.target: 一个QSemaphoreReleaser可以通过调用被取消，以取消（）。取消的信号量释放器将不再在其析构函数中调用QSemaphore :: release（）。

trans-unit.source: A QSequentialIterable::const_iterator can only be created by a QSequentialIterable instance, and can be used in a way similar to other stl-style iterators.
trans-unit.target: 一个QSequentialIterable ::为const_iterator只能通过创建QSequentialIterable实例，并且可以在类似于其他STL风格的迭代的方式来使用。

trans-unit.source: A QSGAbstractRenderer created by a QSGEngine allows you to set your QSGNode tree through setRootNode() and control the rendering viewport through setDeviceRect(), setViewportRect() and setProjectionMatrixToRect(). You can finally trigger the rendering to the desired framebuffer through renderScene().
trans-unit.target: 由QSGEngine创建的QSGAbstractRenderer允许您通过setRootNode（）设置QSGNode树，并通过setDeviceRect（），setViewportRect（）和setProjectionMatrixToRect（）控制渲染视口。您最终可以通过renderScene（）将渲染触发到所需的帧缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: A QSGEngine can be used to render a tree of QSGNode directly on a QWindow or QOpenGLFramebufferObject without any integration with QML, QQuickWindow or QQuickItem and the convenience that they provide.
trans-unit.target: 一个QSGEngine可以用来渲染树QSGNode直接在QWindow或QOpenGLFramebufferObject而不QML，任何集成QQuickWindow或QQuickItem，他们提供方便。

trans-unit.source: A QSGTexture that does not have a native texture object underneath is typically not equal to any other QSGTexture. There are exceptions to this, in particular when atlasing is used (where multiple textures share the same atlas texture under the hood), that is then up to the subclass implementations to deal with as appropriate.
A create() operation failed because a shared memory segment with the specified key already existed.
trans-unit.target: 甲创建（）操作失败，因为使用指定的密钥的共享存储器段已经存在。

trans-unit.source: A create() operation failed because there was not enough memory available to fill the request.
trans-unit.target: 一个创建（）操作失败，因为没有足够的可用内存，以填补该请求。

trans-unit.source: A QSharedPointer object can be created from a normal pointer, another QSharedPointer object or by promoting a QWeakPointer object to a strong reference.
trans-unit.target: 甲QSharedPointer对象可以从一个正常指针，另一个被创建QSharedPointer对象或通过促进QWeakPointer对象很强的参考。

trans-unit.source: A QSizeF specifying a custom paper size in the QPrinter::Point unit.
trans-unit.target: 一个QSizeF，它以QPrinter :: Point单位指定自定义纸张尺寸。

trans-unit.source: A QSizeGrip is placed in the bottom-right corner of the dialog when this property is enabled. By default, the size grip is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 启用此属性后，将在对话框的右下角放置一个QSizeGrip。默认情况下，尺寸夹点是禁用的。

trans-unit.source: A QSqlError object can provide database-specific error data, including the driverText() and databaseText() messages (or both concatenated together as text()), and the nativeErrorCode() and type().
trans-unit.target: 一个QSqlError对象可以提供特定于数据库的错误数据，包括driverText（）和databaseText（）消息（或两者同时作为文本（）串联在一起）以及nativeErrorCode（）和type（）。

trans-unit.source: A QSqlField object can provide some meta-data about the field, for example, its name(), variant type(), length(), precision(), defaultValue(), typeID(), and its requiredStatus(), isGenerated() and isReadOnly(). The field's data can be checked to see if it isNull(), and its value() retrieved. When editing the data can be set with setValue() or set to NULL with clear().
trans-unit.target: 甲QSqlField对象可以提供有关该领域的一些元数据，例如，它的名称（），变体类型（），长度（），精度（），默认值（），TYPEID（），并且它的requiredStatus（），isGenerated（ ）和isReadOnly（）。可以检查字段的数据以查看它是否为isNull（），以及是否检索到其value（）。编辑数据时，可以使用setValue（）设置数据，也可以使用clear（）设置为NULL 。

trans-unit.source: A QSqlTableModel subclass with foreign key support.
trans-unit.target: 一个与QSqlTableModel子与国外关键支撑。

trans-unit.source: A QSslConfiguration object is null if it has been default-constructed and no setter methods have been called.
trans-unit.target: 如果QSslConfiguration对象是默认构造的，并且未调用任何setter方法，则该对象为null。

trans-unit.source: A QStackedLayout can be populated with a number of child widgets ("pages"). For example:
trans-unit.target: 一个QStackedLayout可以用许多子控件（“页”）来填充。例如：

trans-unit.source: A QStateMachine runs its own event loop. For signal transitions (QSignalTransition objects), QStateMachine automatically posts a QStateMachine::SignalEvent to itself when it intercepts the corresponding signal; similarly, for QObject event transitions (QEventTransition objects) a QStateMachine::WrappedEvent is posted.
trans-unit.target: 一个QStateMachine运行其自己的事件循环。对于信号转换（QSignalTransition对象），当QStateMachine截获相应的信号时，会自动将QStateMachine :: SignalEvent投递到其自身。类似地，对于QObject事件转换（QEventTransition对象），将发布QStateMachine :: WrappedEvent。

trans-unit.source: A QString can embed '\0' characters (QChar::Null). The size() function always returns the size of the whole string, including embedded '\0' characters.
trans-unit.target: 甲的QString可以嵌入'\ 0'字符（QChar则::空）。的尺寸（）函数总是返回整个字符串的大小，包括嵌入式“\ 0”字符。

trans-unit.source: A QStringView references a contiguous portion of a UTF-16 string it does not own. It acts as an interface type to all kinds of UTF-16 string, without the need to construct a QString first.
trans-unit.target: 甲QStringView引用它不拥有UTF-16串的邻接部分。它充当所有UTF-16字符串的接口类型，而无需首先构造QString。

trans-unit.source: A QStyleOptionHeader::SectionPosition value giving the header section's position relative to the other sections.
trans-unit.target: 一个QStyleOptionHeader :: SectionPosition值，给出标题部分相对于其他部分的位置。

trans-unit.source: A QStyleOptionHeader::SelectedPosition value giving the selected section's position relative to the section that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 一个QStyleOptionHeader :: SelectedPosition值，给出了选定部分相对于正在绘制的部分的位置。

trans-unit.source: A QStyleOptionHeader::SortIndicator value that describes the direction in which the section's sort indicator should be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 一个QStyleOptionHeader :: SortIndicator值，该值描述应绘制该部分的排序指示符的方向。

trans-unit.source: A Qt::ArrowType enum value, which contains the direction of the buttons arrow (if an arrow is to be used in place of an icon).
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt :: ArrowType枚举值，它包含按钮箭头的方向（如果要使用箭头代替图标）。

trans-unit.source: A Qt::Corner value that describes which corner in a window (or equivalent) the grip is located.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt :: Corner值，它描述手柄位于窗口（或等效窗口）中的哪个角。

trans-unit.source: A Qt::Orientation enum value that indicates whether the slider is vertical or horizontal.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt的::取向枚举值，表示所述滑块是垂直的还是水平的。

trans-unit.source: A Qt::Orientation value deciding whether the header is the horizontal header above the view or the vertical header on the left.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt :: Orientation值，它决定标题是视图上方的水平标题还是左侧的垂直标题。

trans-unit.source: A Qt::ToolButtonStyle enum value which decides whether the button shows the icon, the text, or both.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt :: ToolButtonStyle枚举值，该值决定按钮是否显示图标，文本或两者。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DAnimation::QKeyframeAnimation class implements simple keyframe animation that can be used to animate QTransform. The keyframes consists of multiple timed QTransforms, which are interpolated and applied to the target QTransform. QEasingCurve is used between keyframes to control the interpolator. RepeatMode can be set for when the position set to the QKeyframeAnimation is below or above the values defined in the keyframe positions.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DAnimation :: QKeyframeAnimation类实现简单的关键帧动画，可以用来制作动画QTransform。关键帧由多个定时的QTransform组成，这些插值并应用于目标QTransform。在关键帧之间使用QEasingCurve来控制插值器。REPEATMODE可以用于当位置设置到被设置QKeyframeAnimation低于或高于在所述关键帧的位置定义的值。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DAnimation::QKeyframeAnimation class implements simple keyframe animation that can be used to animate QTransform. The keyframes consists of multiple timed QTransforms, which are interpolated and applied to the target QTransform. QEasingCurve is used between keyframes to control the interpolator. RepeatMode can be set for when the position set to the QKeyframeAnimation is below or above the values defined in the keyframe positions.

A Qt3DAnimation::QMorphingAnimation class implements blend-shape morphing animation to a target QGeometryRenderer. The QMorphingAnimation sets the correct QAttributes from the morph targets to the target QGeometryRenderer::geometry and calculates interpolator for the current position. The actual blending between the attributes must be implemented in the material. Qt3DAnimation::QMorphPhongMaterial implements material with morphing support for phong lighting model. The blending happens between 2 attributes - 'base' and 'target'. The names for the base and target attributes are taken from the morph target names, where the base attribute retains the name it already has and the target attribute name gets 'Target' appended to the name. The interpolator can be set as a QParameter to the used material. All morph targets in the animation should contain the attributes with same names as those in the base geometry.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DAnimation :: QMorphingAnimation类实现共混物形变形动画目标QGeometryRenderer。该QMorphingAnimation设置正确QAttributes从变形目标到目标QGeometryRenderer ::几何并计算当前位置的插值器。属性之间的实际混合必须在材料中实现。 Qt3DAnimation :: QMorphPhongMaterial实现具有对Phong照明模型的变形支持的材质。混合发生在2个属性之间-“基本”和“目标”。基本属性和目标属性的名称取自变形目标名称，其中基本属性保留其已经拥有的名称，并且目标属性名称被附加在名称后的“目标”。可以将内插器设置为所用材质的QParameter。动画中的所有变形目标都应包含与基础几何图形名称相同的属性。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DAnimation::QMorphingAnimation class implements blend-shape morphing animation to a target QGeometryRenderer. The QMorphingAnimation sets the correct QAttributes from the morph targets to the target QGeometryRenderer::geometry and calculates interpolator for the current position. The actual blending between the attributes must be implemented in the material. Qt3DAnimation::QMorphPhongMaterial implements material with morphing support for phong lighting model. The blending happens between 2 attributes - 'base' and 'target'. The names for the base and target attributes are taken from the morph target names, where the base attribute retains the name it already has and the target attribute name gets 'Target' appended to the name. The interpolator can be set as a QParameter to the used material. All morph targets in the animation should contain the attributes with same names as those in the base geometry.

A Qt3DAnimation::QMorphTarget class is a convenience class, which provides a list of QAttributes, which the QMorphingAnimation uses to animate geometry. A QMorphTarget can also be created based on existing Qt3DRender::QGeometry.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DAnimation :: QMorphTarget类是一个方便的类，它提供的列表QAttributes，其QMorphingAnimation用途进行动画的几何形状。一个QMorphTarget也可以基于现有的创建Qt3DRender :: QGeometry。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DAnimation::QMorphTarget class is a convenience class, which provides a list of QAttributes, which the QMorphingAnimation uses to animate geometry. A QMorphTarget can also be created based on existing Qt3DRender::QGeometry.

A Qt3DAnimation::QVertexBlendAnimation class implements vertex-blend morphing animation to a target QGeometryRenderer. The QVertexBlendAnimation sets the correct QAttributes from the morph targets to the target QGeometryRenderer::geometry and calculates interpolator for the current position. Unlike with QMorphingAnimation, where the blending is controller with blend weights, the blending occurs between sequential morph targets. The actual blending between the attributes must be implemented in the material. Qt3DAnimation::QMorphPhongMaterial implements material with morphing support for phong lighting model. The blending happens between 2 attributes - 'base' and 'target'. The names for the base and target attributes are taken from the morph target names, where the base attribute retains the name it already has and the target attribute name gets 'Target' appended to the name. The interpolator can be set as a QParameter to the used material. All morph targets in the animation should contain the attributes with same names as those in the base geometry.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DAnimation :: QVertexBlendAnimation类实现顶点混合变形动画目标QGeometryRenderer。该QVertexBlendAnimation设置正确QAttributes从变形目标到目标QGeometryRenderer ::几何学和计算插值的当前位置。与QMorphingAnimation不同，其中混合是具有混合权重的控制器，则混合发生在顺序的变形目标之间。属性之间的实际混合必须在材料中实现。 Qt3DAnimation :: QMorphPhongMaterial实现具有对Phong照明模型的变形支持的材质。混合发生在2个属性之间-“基本”和“目标”。基本属性和目标属性的名称取自变形目标名称，其中基本属性保留其已经拥有的名称，并且目标属性名称被附加在名称后的“目标”。可以将内插器设置为所用材质的QParameter。动画中的所有变形目标都应包含与基础几何图形名称相同的属性。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DAnimation::QVertexBlendAnimation class implements vertex-blend morphing animation to a target QGeometryRenderer. The QVertexBlendAnimation sets the correct QAttributes from the morph targets to the target QGeometryRenderer::geometry and calculates interpolator for the current position. Unlike with QMorphingAnimation, where the blending is controller with blend weights, the blending occurs between sequential morph targets. The actual blending between the attributes must be implemented in the material. Qt3DAnimation::QMorphPhongMaterial implements material with morphing support for phong lighting model. The blending happens between 2 attributes - 'base' and 'target'. The names for the base and target attributes are taken from the morph target names, where the base attribute retains the name it already has and the target attribute name gets 'Target' appended to the name. The interpolator can be set as a QParameter to the used material. All morph targets in the animation should contain the attributes with same names as those in the base geometry.

trans-unit.target: 一个QComponent已添加到QEntity。

trans-unit.target: 一个QComponent已从删除QEntity。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DCore::QComponent provides a vertical slice of behavior that can be assigned to and sometimes shared across Qt3DCore::QEntity instances.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DCore :: QComponent提供了可以被分配给和有时跨越共享行为的一个垂直切片Qt3DCore :: QEntity实例。

trans-unit.target: 一个QNodeCommand已节点和其后端之间发送。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DInput::QAxis reports the current position of an axis on an input device. When the axis is returned to its neutral position the value of that axis returns to 0. Often, it is required to have the input from an axis control a variable in other ways, for example treating the value from the Qt3DInput::QAxis as a velocity (first derivative with respect to time) or as an acceleration (second derivative with respect to time). This can be done with user code or with a Qt3DLogic::QFrameAction but those approached are not ideal as they add more work to the main thread and are inherently imperative. The Qt3DInput::QAxisAccumulator class allows for this common task to be performed on the Qt 3D backend and be specified in a declarative manner.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DInput :: QAxis报告一个轴的输入装置上的当前位置。当轴返回其中间位置时，该轴的值将返回0。通常，需要以其他方式将来自轴的输入控制为变量，例如，将来自Qt3DInput :: QAxis的值视为速度（相对于时间的一阶导数）或加速度（相对于时间的二阶导数）。这可以通过用户代码或Qt3DLogic :: QFrameAction来完成，但是所采用的方法并不理想，因为它们向主线程添加了更多工作，并且从本质上来说是必须的。该Qt3DInput :: QAxisAccumulator class允许在Qt 3D后端执行此常规任务，并以声明的方式指定。

trans-unit.source: A QMouseDevice delegates mouse events from physical mouse device to QMouseHandler objects. The sensitivity of the mouse can be controlled with the QMouseDevice::sensitivity property, which specifies the rate in which the logical mouse coordinates change in response to physical movement of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 一个QMouseDevice从物理鼠标设备委托鼠标事件QMouseHandler对象。可以通过QMouseDevice :: sensitiveivity属性控制鼠标的灵敏度，该属性指定逻辑鼠标坐标响应于鼠标的物理移动而变化的速率。

trans-unit.source: A GeometryRenderer holds all the information necessary to draw a Geometry. A Geometry holds the coordinates of the geometry data - GeometryRenderer specifies how to interpret that data.
trans-unit.target: 一个GeometryRenderer拥有所有必要的绘制几何信息。几何保存几何数据的坐标-GeometryRenderer指定如何解释该数据。

trans-unit.source: A QAbstractTextureImage that can be written through a QPainter. More...
trans-unit.target: 一个QAbstractTextureImage可以通过编写的QPainter。更多...

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QAlphaCoverage class enables alpha-to-coverage multisampling mode. When enabled, the fragment alpha value is used as a coverage for the sample and combined with fragment coverage value. Qt3DRender::QAlphaCoverage does nothing if multisampling is disabled. Alpha-to-coverage is most useful when order independent blending is required, for example when rendering leaves, grass and other rich vegetation.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QAlphaCoverage类使字母以覆盖多采样模式。启用后，片段alpha值将用作样本的覆盖率，并与片段覆盖率值组合。如果禁用了多重采样，则Qt3DRender :: QAlphaCoverage将不执行任何操作。当需要顺序无关的混合时（例如，渲染叶子，草和其他丰富的植被时），从覆盖到覆盖最有用。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QCameraSelector can be used to select the camera, which is used by the FrameGraph when drawing the entities.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QCameraSelector可用于选择摄像机，其被绘制实体时所使用的FrameGraph。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QClearBuffers FrameGraph node enables clearing of the specific render target buffers with specific values.
trans-unit.target: 通过Qt3DRender :: QClearBuffers FrameGraph节点，可以清除具有特定值的特定渲染目标缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QComputeCommand is used to issue work for the compute shader. The compute shader is specified in the QMaterial component of the same entity the QComputeCommand is added to. The workGroupX, workGroupY and workGroupZ properties specify the work group sizes for the compute shader invocation. Qt3DRender::QDispatchCompute node needs to be present in the FrameGraph to actually issue the commands.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QComputeCommand用于发行工作，为计算着色器。在添加了QComputeCommand的同一实体的QMaterial组件中指定了计算着色器。该workGroupX，workGroupY和workGroupZ属性指定计算着色器调用的工作组大小。Qt3DRender :: QDispatchCompute节点需要出现在FrameGraph中才能实际发出命令。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QComputeCommand is used to issue work for the compute shader. The compute shader is specified in the QMaterial component of the same entity the QComputeCommand is added to. The workGroupX, workGroupY and workGroupZ properties specify the work group sizes for the compute shader invocation. Qt3DRender::QDispatchCompute node needs to be present in the FrameGraph to actually issue the commands.

A QDepthTest class is used to enable depth testing with a given depth test function. The depth test enables writing fragment color values when the depth test passes, and reject fragments which fail the test. The depth test uses the depth function to test the fragments depth value to the value against z-buffer. If the underlying surface does not have z-buffer, then QDepthTest does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 甲QDepthTest类用于使能与给定的深度测试功能深度测试。深度测试可在深度测试通过时写入片段颜色值，并拒绝未通过测试的片段。深度测试使用深度功能将片段深度值测试为针对z缓冲区的值。如果基础表面没有z缓冲区，则QDepthTest不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QDispatchCompute allows work to be issued for the compute shader to run on the GPU. The workGroupX, workGroupY and workGroupZ properties specify the work group sizes for the compute shader invocation. QComputeCommand components need to be added to entities to instruct Qt3D to select the materials and geometry from the entities for the compute invocation. The work group sizes for the shader invocation will be the maximum of the work group sizes specified in QDispatchCompute and QComputeCommand.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QDispatchCompute允许工作将予发行的计算着色器来在GPU上运行。该workGroupX，workGroupY和workGroupZ属性指定计算着色器调用的工作组大小。需要将QComputeCommand组件添加到实体中，以指示Qt3D从实体中选择材质和几何图形以进行计算调用。着色器调用的工作组大小将是QDispatchCompute和QComputeCommand中指定的最大工作组大小。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QDispatchCompute allows work to be issued for the compute shader to run on the GPU. The workGroupX, workGroupY and workGroupZ properties specify the work group sizes for the compute shader invocation. QComputeCommand components need to be added to entities to instruct Qt3D to select the materials and geometry from the entities for the compute invocation. The work group sizes for the shader invocation will be the maximum of the work group sizes specified in QDispatchCompute and QComputeCommand.

A Qt3DRender::QDithering class enables dithering. Dithering adds noise to the color values to randomize quantization error in order to prevent large scale patterns in the final image, such as banding. Dithering is most useful when rendering to a surface with low color bit depth, such as RGB565 or RGBA4444.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QDithering类使抖动。抖动会在颜色值中添加噪声，以使量化误差随机化，以防止最终图像中出现大范围的图案，例如条带。当渲染到具有低颜色位深度的表面（例如RGB565或RGBA4444）时，抖动最有用。

trans-unit.source: A QFrameGraphNode used to select QTechniques to use. More...
trans-unit.target: 一个QFrameGraphNode用于选择要使用的QTechniques。更多...

trans-unit.source: A QFrameGraphNode used to select QTechniques to use. More...
trans-unit.target: 一个QFrameGraphNode用于选择要使用的QTechniques。更多...

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QFrontFace sets the winding direction of the front facing polygons.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QFrontFace设置的多边形的前部的卷绕方向。

trans-unit.source: A QFrustumCulling class enables frustum culling of the drawable entities based on the camera view and QGeometry bounds of the entities. If QFrustumCulling is present in the FrameGraph, only the entities whose QGeometry bounds intersect with the camera frustum, i.e. the view of the camera, are drawn. If QFrustumCulling is not present, all drawable entities will be drawn. The camera is selected by a QCameraSelector frame graph node in the current hierarchy. Frustum culling can save a lot of GPU processing time when the rendered scene is complex.
trans-unit.target: 甲QFrustumCulling类使域剔除基于摄像机视图和可拉伸实体QGeometry实体的边界。如果在FrameGraph中存在QFrustumCulling，则仅绘制其QGeometry边界与摄影机视锥相交的实体，即摄影机的视图。如果不存在QFrustumCulling，则将绘制所有可绘制实体。通过当前层次结构中的QCameraSelector帧图节点选择摄像机。当渲染的场景很复杂时，平截头体剔除可以节省大量GPU处理时间。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QGeometry aggregates various attributes to form a piece of geometry. Usually a proper geometry will provide an attribute for vertex positions, an attribute for vertex normals and an attribute for texture coordinates. If you want your geometry to also work with normal mapped materials it will need to provide a consistent set of vertex tangent vectors too.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QGeometry聚集各种属性，以形成片的几何形状。通常，适当的几何形状将为顶点位置提供一个属性，为顶点法线提供一个属性，为纹理坐标提供一个属性。如果希望您的几何体也可以使用法线贴图材质，则还需要提供一组一致的顶点切向量。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QGeometry class is used to group a list of Qt3DRender::QAttribute objects together to form a geometric shape Qt3D is able to render using Qt3DRender::QGeometryRenderer. Special attribute can be set in order to calculate bounding volume of the shape.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QGeometry类用于组的列表Qt3DRender :: QAttribute对象在一起以形成几何形状Qt3D能够使用渲染Qt3DRender :: QGeometryRenderer。可以设置特殊属性，以计算形状的边界体积。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QGeometryRenderer holds all the information necessary to draw a Qt3DRender::QGeometry. A QGeometry holds the coordinates of the geometry data - QGeometryRenderer specifies how to interpret that data.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QGeometryRenderer拥有所有必要的绘制信息Qt3DRender :: QGeometry。一个QGeometry持有几何数据的坐标- QGeometryRenderer指定如何解释这些数据。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QGeometryRenderer holds all the information necessary to draw a Qt3DRender::QGeometry. A QGeometry holds the coordinates of the geometry data - QGeometryRenderer specifies how to interpret that data.
A QLayer can be applied to a subtree of entities by setting the recursive property to true.
trans-unit.target: 一个QLayer可以通过递归属性设置为true适用于实体的子树。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QLayerFilter can be used to instruct the renderer as to which layer(s) to draw in that branch of the frame graph. QLayerFilter selects which entities to draw based on the QLayer instance(s) added to the QLayerFilter and as components to Qt3DCore::QEntity.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QLayerFilter可以用来指示渲染器哪个层（一个或多个）在该帧图的一个分支，来绘制。QLayerFilter根据添加到QLayerFilter的QLayer实例以及作为Qt3DCore :: QEntity的组件来选择要绘制的实体。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QLayerFilter can be used to instruct the renderer as to which layer(s) to draw in that branch of the frame graph. QLayerFilter selects which entities to draw based on the QLayer instance(s) added to the QLayerFilter and as components to Qt3DCore::QEntity.

A Qt3DRender::QMemoryBarrier FrameGraph node is used to emplace a specific memory barrier at a specific time of the rendering. This is required to properly synchronize drawing and compute commands on the GPU.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QMemoryBarrier FrameGraph节点用于在呈现的特定时间布设的特定存储器屏障。这是在GPU上正确同步绘图和计算命令所必需的。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QMultiSampleAntiAliasing class enables multisample antialiasing.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QMultiSampleAntiAliasing类允许多重采样抗锯齿。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QNoDepthMask class disables fragment depth write to depth buffer.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QNoDepthMask类禁用片段深度写入深度缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: A QPaintedTextureImage must be subclassed and the virtual paint() function implemented. Each time update() is called on the QPaintedTextureImage, the paint() function is invoked and the resulting image is uploaded.
trans-unit.target: 一个QPaintedTextureImage必须被继承和虚拟颜料（）函数来实现。每次更新（）被调用的QPaintedTextureImage中，涂料被调用（）函数和所得到的图像上载。

trans-unit.source: A QPaintedTextureImage provides a way to specify a texture image (and thus an OpenGL texture) through a QPainter. The width and height of the texture image can be specified through the width and height or size properties.
trans-unit.target: 甲QPaintedTextureImage提供了一种方式，通过一个指定的纹理图像（因此一个OpenGL纹理）的QPainter。可以通过width和height或size属性指定纹理图像的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: A QParameter can be referenced by a QRenderPass, QTechnique, QEffect, QMaterial, QTechniqueFilter, QRenderPassFilter. At runtime, depending on which shader is selected for a given step of the rendering, the value contained in a QParameter will be converted and uploaded if the shader contains a uniform with a name matching that of the QParameter.
trans-unit.target: 甲QParameter可以由被引用QRenderPass，QTechnique，QEffect，QMaterial，QTechniqueFilter，QRenderPassFilter。在运行时，取决于着色器为给定的渲染步骤选择了哪个着色器，如果着色器包含名称与QParameter的名称相同的制服，则将转换并上传QParameter中包含的值。

trans-unit.source: A QParameter defined on a QMaterial is overridden by a QParameter (of the same name) defined in a QTechniqueFilter or a QRenderPassFilter.
trans-unit.target: 在QMaterial上定义的QParameter被QTechniqueFilter或QRenderPassFilter中定义的QParameter（具有相同名称）覆盖。

trans-unit.source: A QParameter defined on a QMaterial is overridden by a QParameter (of the same name) defined in a QTechniqueFilter or a QRenderPassFilter.
A QParameter defined on an Effect is overridden by a QParameter (of the same name) defined in a QMaterial, QTechniqueFilter, QRenderPassFilter.
trans-unit.target: 甲QParameter上的效果定义由重写QParameter在限定（同名）QMaterial，QTechniqueFilter，QRenderPassFilter。

trans-unit.source: A QPolygonOffset class adds an offset to the fragment depth value prior to depth test and depth write. The offset can be used to avoid z-fighting when rendering polygons with very close depth values such as decals.
trans-unit.target: 甲QPolygonOffset类添加的偏移之前，深度测试和深度写片段深度值。当渲染深度值非常接近的多边形（例如贴花）时，可以使用偏移量来避免Z值冲突。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QProximityFilter can be used to select entities to render when they are placed within a given distance threshold of another entity.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QProximityFilter可以用来选择实体，当它们被放置的另一实体的给定距离阈值内进行渲染。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QRenderPass specifies a single rendering pass - an instance of shader program execution - used by Qt3DRender::QTechnique. Render pass consists of a Qt3DRender::QShaderProgram and a list of Qt3DRender::QFilterKey objects, a list of Qt3DRender::QRenderState objects and a list of Qt3DRender::QParameter objects.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QRenderPass指定单个渲染通道-着色器程序执行的一个实例-通过用于Qt3DRender :: QTechnique。渲染过程由Qt3DRender :: QShaderProgram和Qt3DRender :: QFilterKey对象的列表，Qt3DRender :: QRenderState对象的列表以及Qt3DRender :: QParameter对象的列表组成。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QRenderPassFilter FrameGraph node is used to select which Qt3DRender::QRenderPass objects are selected for drawing. QRenderPassFilter specifies a list of Qt3DRender::QFilterKey objects and Qt3DRender::QParameter objects. When QRenderPassFilter is present in the FrameGraph, only the QRenderPass objects, whose Qt3DRender::QFilterKey objects match the keys in QRenderPassFilter are selected for rendering. If no QRenderPassFilter is present, then all QRenderPass objects are selected for rendering. The parameters in the list can be used to set values for shader parameters. The parameters in QRenderPassFilter are overridden by parameters in QTechniqueFilter, QTechnique and QRenderPass.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QRenderPassFilter FrameGraph节点被用来选择哪个Qt3DRender :: QRenderPass被选择用于图形对象。QRenderPassFilter指定Qt3DRender :: QFilterKey对象和Qt3DRender :: QParameter对象的列表。当QRenderPassFilter存在于FrameGraph，只有QRenderPass对象，其Qt3DRender :: QFilterKey对象匹配在键QRenderPassFilter被选择用于再现。如果不存在QRenderPassFilter，则所有QRenderPass选择对象进行渲染。列表中的参数可用于设置着色器参数的值。在参数QRenderPassFilter通过在参数覆盖QTechniqueFilter，QTechnique和QRenderPass。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QRenderPassFilter FrameGraph node is used to select which Qt3DRender::QRenderPass objects are selected for drawing. QRenderPassFilter specifies a list of Qt3DRender::QFilterKey objects and Qt3DRender::QParameter objects. When QRenderPassFilter is present in the FrameGraph, only the QRenderPass objects, whose Qt3DRender::QFilterKey objects match the keys in QRenderPassFilter are selected for rendering. If no QRenderPassFilter is present, then all QRenderPass objects are selected for rendering. The parameters in the list can be used to set values for shader parameters. The parameters in QRenderPassFilter are overridden by parameters in QTechniqueFilter, QTechnique and QRenderPass.
A Qt3DRender::QRenderState class is abstract base class for all render states. One can not instantiate QRenderState directly, but through its subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QRenderState类是抽象基类所有的渲染状态。一个人不能直接实例化QRenderState，而是可以通过其子类实例化。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QRenderState class is abstract base class for all render states. One can not instantiate QRenderState directly, but through its subclasses.

A Qt3DRender::QRenderTarget comprises of Qt3DRender::QRenderTargetOutput objects, which specify the the buffers the render target is rendering to. The user can specify MRT(Multiple Render Targets) by attaching multiple textures to different attachment points. The results are undefined if the user tries to attach multiple textures to the same attachment point. At render time, only the draw buffers specified in the Qt3DRender::QRenderTargetSelector are used.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QRenderTarget包括Qt3DRender :: QRenderTargetOutput对象，指定缓冲器的渲染目标被渲染。用户可以通过将多个纹理附加到不同的附加点来指定MRT（多个渲染目标）。如果用户尝试将多个纹理附加到同一附加点，则结果是不确定的。在渲染时，仅使用在Qt3DRender :: QRenderTargetSelector中指定的绘图缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: A QRenderTargetOutput specifies the attachment point and parameters for texture that is attached to render target. In addition to the attachment point, texture miplevel, layer and cubemap face can be specified. The texture attached to the QRenderTargetOutput must be compatible with the given parameters.
trans-unit.target: 甲QRenderTargetOutput指定的连接点和连接到渲染目标纹理的参数。除了附着点之外，还可以指定纹理的miplevel，图层和立方体贴图面。附加到QRenderTargetOutput的纹理必须与给定的参数兼容。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QRenderTargetSelector is used to select active Qt3DRender::QRenderTarget for the FrameGraph. When QRenderTargetSelector is present in the FrameGraph, the rendering is directed into QTexture objects or draw buffers instead of the surface specified in the Qt3DRender::QRenderSurfaceSelector. A render buffer is automatically generated for an attachment point if drawBuffers contain attachment point that any output in the QRenderTarget do not specify. If the drawBuffers is empty, the renderer will default to using all the outputs in QRenderTarget.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QRenderTargetSelector用来选择主动Qt3DRender :: QRenderTarget为FrameGraph。如果FrameGraph中存在QRenderTargetSelector，则将渲染定向到QTexture对象或绘制缓冲区中，而不是Qt3DRender :: QRenderSurfaceSelector中指定的表面。如果drawBuffers包含QRenderTarget中未指定任何输出的附件点，则会为附件点自动生成渲染缓冲区。如果drawBuffers为空，则渲染器将默认使用QRenderTarget中的所有输出。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QRenderTargetSelector is used to select active Qt3DRender::QRenderTarget for the FrameGraph. When QRenderTargetSelector is present in the FrameGraph, the rendering is directed into QTexture objects or draw buffers instead of the surface specified in the Qt3DRender::QRenderSurfaceSelector. A render buffer is automatically generated for an attachment point if drawBuffers contain attachment point that any output in the QRenderTarget do not specify. If the drawBuffers is empty, the renderer will default to using all the outputs in QRenderTarget.
A QScissorTest class enables scissor test, which discards fragments outside the rectangular area of the screen specified by the left, bottom, width and height properties.
trans-unit.target: 甲QScissorTest类使剪刀测试，由左，下，宽度和高度属性指定的屏幕的矩形区域外丢弃片段。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QSortPolicy class stores the sorting type used by the FrameGraph. The sort types determine how drawable entities are sorted before drawing to determine the drawing order. When QSortPolicy is present in the FrameGraph, the sorting mechanism is determined by the SortTypes list. Multiple sort types can be used simultaneously. If QSortPolicy is not present in the FrameGraph, entities are drawn in the order they appear in the entity hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QSortPolicy类存储由FrameGraph使用的排序类型。排序类型确定可绘制实体在绘制之前如何排序以确定绘制顺序。当FrameGraph中存在QSortPolicy时，排序机制由SortTypes列表确定。可以同时使用多种排序类型。如果FrameGraph中不存在QSortPolicy，则按照在实体层次结构中出现的顺序绘制实体。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QSortPolicy class stores the sorting type used by the FrameGraph. The sort types determine how drawable entities are sorted before drawing to determine the drawing order. When QSortPolicy is present in the FrameGraph, the sorting mechanism is determined by the sortTypes list. Multiple sort types can be used simultaneously. If QSortPolicy is not present in the FrameGraph, entities are drawn in the order they appear in the entity hierarchy.

A Qt3DRender::QStencilMask class specifies a write mask for the stencil values after the stencil test. Mask can be specified separately for the front-facing and back-facing polygons. The fragment stencil value is and'd with the mask before it is written to the stencil buffer.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QStencilMask类为模板测试后的模板值指定一个写掩码。可以分别为正面和背面多边形指定蒙版。在将片段模板值写入模板缓冲区之前，将其与掩码进行交互。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QStencilOperation class specifies the stencil operations for the front- and back-facing polygons. The stencil operation control what is done to fragment when the stencil and depth test pass or fail.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QStencilOperation类为前端和后端的多边形的模板操作。模板操作控制在模板和深度测试通过或失败时对片段进行的处理。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QStencilTest class specifies argument for the stencil test. The stencil test comprises of three arguments: stencil test function, stencil test mask and stencil reference value. QStencilTest allows these arguments to be set for both front- and back-facing polygons separately.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QStencilTest类指定为参数的模板测试。模板测试包含三个参数：模板测试功能，模板测试模板和模板参考值。QStencilTest允许分别为正面和背面多边形设置这些参数。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QStencilTest class specifies argument for the stencil test. The stencil test comprises of three arguments: stencil test function, stencil test mask and stencil reference value. QStencilTest allows these arguments to be set for both front- and back-facing polygons separately.

A Qt3DRender::QTechnique specifies a set of Qt3DRender::QRenderPass objects, Qt3DRender::QFilterKey objects, Qt3DRender::QParameter objects and a Qt3DRender::QGraphicsApiFilter, which together define a rendering technique the given graphics API can render. The filter keys are used by Qt3DRender::QTechniqueFilter to select specific techniques at specific parts of the FrameGraph. If two QParameter instances with the same name are specified in a QTechnique and a QRenderPass, the one in Technique overrides the one used in the QRenderPass.
trans-unit.target: 甲Qt3DRender :: QTechnique指定一组Qt3DRender :: QRenderPass对象，Qt3DRender :: QFilterKey对象，Qt3DRender :: QParameter对象和Qt3DRender :: QGraphicsApiFilter，它们一起限定一个渲染技术给定的图形API可以呈现。Qt3DRender :: QTechniqueFilter使用过滤键在FrameGraph的特定部分选择特定技术。如果在QTechnique和QRenderPass中指定了两个具有相同名称的QParameter实例，那么Technique中的一个将覆盖QRenderPass中使用的一个。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QTechnique specifies a set of Qt3DRender::QRenderPass objects, Qt3DRender::QFilterKey objects, Qt3DRender::QParameter objects and a Qt3DRender::QGraphicsApiFilter, which together define a rendering technique the given graphics API can render. The filter keys are used by Qt3DRender::QTechniqueFilter to select specific techniques at specific parts of the FrameGraph. If two QParameter instances with the same name are specified in a QTechnique and a QRenderPass, the one in Technique overrides the one used in the QRenderPass.

A Qt3DRender::QTechniqueFilter specifies which techniques are used by the FrameGraph when rendering the entities. QTechniqueFilter specifies a list of Qt3DRender::QFilterKey objects and Qt3DRender::QParameter objects. When QTechniqueFilter is present in the FrameGraph, only the techiques matching the keys in the list are used for rendering. The parameters in the list can be used to set values for shader parameters. The parameters in QTechniqueFilter are overridden by parameters in QTechnique and QRenderPass.
trans-unit.target: 一个Qt3DRender :: QTechniqueFilter指定哪些技术是由FrameGraph呈现实体时使用。QTechniqueFilter指定Qt3DRender :: QFilterKey对象和Qt3DRender :: QParameter对象的列表。当FrameGraph中存在QTechniqueFilter时，仅使用与列表中的键匹配的技术进行渲染。列表中的参数可用于设置着色器参数的值。在参数QTechniqueFilter通过在参数覆盖QTechnique和QRenderPass。

trans-unit.source: A Qt3DRender::QTechniqueFilter specifies which techniques are used by the FrameGraph when rendering the entities. QTechniqueFilter specifies a list of Qt3DRender::QFilterKey objects and Qt3DRender::QParameter objects. When QTechniqueFilter is present in the FrameGraph, only the techiques matching the keys in the list are used for rendering. The parameters in the list can be used to set values for shader parameters. The parameters in QTechniqueFilter are overridden by parameters in QTechnique and QRenderPass.

A QTableView implements a table view that displays items from a model. This class is used to provide standard tables that were previously provided by the QTable class, but using the more flexible approach provided by Qt's model/view architecture.
trans-unit.target: 甲QTableView中实现了一个表视图，其从模型显示项目。此类用于提供以前由QTable类提供的标准表，但使用Qt的模型/视图体系结构提供的更灵活的方法。

trans-unit.source: A QTabWidget instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个QTabWidget实例。

trans-unit.source: A QTemporaryFile will always be opened in QIODevice::ReadWrite mode, this allows easy access to the data in the file. This function will return true upon success and will set the fileName() to the unique filename used.
trans-unit.target: 一个QTemporaryFile将永远被打开了QIODevice ::读写模式，这可以方便地访问文件中的数据。成功后，此函数将返回true，并将fileName（）设置为使用的唯一文件名。

trans-unit.source: A QTestEventList can be populated with GUI events that can be stored as test data for later usage, or be replayed on any QWidget. QTestEventList provides convenience functions for populating the list.
trans-unit.target: 甲QTestEventList可以用可被存储作为测试数据供以后使用，或在任意的重放GUI事件来填充QWidget的。QTestEventList提供了用于填充列表的便捷功能。

trans-unit.source: A QTextCharFormat for the part of the preedit string specified by start and length. value contains a QVariant of type QTextFormat specifying rendering of this part of the preedit string. There should be at most one format for every part of the preedit string. If several are specified for any character in the string the behaviour is undefined. A conforming implementation has to at least honor the backgroundColor, textColor and fontUnderline properties of the format.
trans-unit.target: 一个QTextCharFormat，用于由开始和长度指定的部分预编辑字符串。值包含类型为QTextFormat的QVariant，用于指定该部分预编辑字符串的呈现。预编辑字符串的每个部分最多应有一种格式。如果为字符串中的任何字符指定了多个，则行为未定义。符合标准的实现必须至少遵循格式的backgroundColor，textColor和fontUnderline属性。

trans-unit.source: A QTextCursor also has an anchor() position. The text that is between the anchor() and the position() is the selection. If anchor() == position() there is no selection.
trans-unit.target: 甲QTextCursor还具有锚（）的位置。锚点（）和位置（）之间的文本是所选内容。如果锚点（）== 位置（），则没有选择。

trans-unit.source: A QTextDocument can be edited programmatically using a QTextCursor, and its contents can be examined by traversing the document structure. The entire document structure is stored as a hierarchy of document elements beneath the root frame, found with the rootFrame() function. Alternatively, if you just want to iterate over the textual contents of the document you can use begin(), end(), and findBlock() to retrieve text blocks that you can examine and iterate over.
trans-unit.target: 甲另外，QTextDocument可以通过编程使用进行编辑QTextCursor，并且其内容可以由遍历文档结构进行检查。整个文档结构作为文档元素的层次结构存储在根框架下，可通过rootFrame（）函数找到。另外，如果只想遍历文档的文本内容，则可以使用begin（），end（）和findBlock（）检索可以检查和遍历的文本块。

trans-unit.source: A QTextDocumentFragment is a fragment of rich text, that can be inserted into a QTextDocument. A document fragment can be created from a QTextDocument, from a QTextCursor's selection, or from another document fragment. Document fragments can also be created by the static functions, fromPlainText() and fromHtml().
trans-unit.target: 一个QTextDocumentFragment是富文本的片段，可以插入另外，QTextDocument。可以从QTextDocument，QTextCursor的选择或另一个文档片段创建文档片段。也可以通过静态函数fromPlainText（）和fromHtml（）创建文档片段。

trans-unit.source: A QTextFormat is a generic class used for describing the format of parts of a QTextDocument. The derived classes QTextCharFormat, QTextBlockFormat, QTextListFormat, and QTextTableFormat are usually more useful, and describe the formatting that is applied to specific parts of the document.
trans-unit.target: 甲QTextFormat是用于描述一个部分的格式的通用类另外，QTextDocument。派生类QTextCharFormat，QTextBlockFormat，QTextListFormat和QTextTableFormat通常更有用，它们描述了应用于文档特定部分的格式。

trans-unit.source: A QThread object manages one thread of control within the program. QThreads begin executing in run(). By default, run() starts the event loop by calling exec() and runs a Qt event loop inside the thread.
trans-unit.target: 一个QThread对象管理程序中的一个控制线程。QThreads开始在run（）中执行。默认情况下，run（）通过调用exec（）启动事件循环，并在线程内部运行Qt事件循环。

trans-unit.source: A QTime object contains a clock time, which it can express as the numbers of hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds since midnight. It can read the current time from the system clock and measure a span of elapsed time. It provides functions for comparing times and for manipulating a time by adding a number of milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 一个QTime对象包含一个时钟时间，它可以表示为自午夜以来的小时，分​​钟，秒和毫秒数。它可以从系统时钟读取当前时间，并测量经过时间的跨度。它提供了比较时间和通过增加毫秒数来操纵时间的功能。

trans-unit.source: A QTime object is typically created either by giving the number of hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds explicitly, or by using the static function currentTime(), which creates a QTime object that represents the system's local time.
trans-unit.target: 甲QTIME对象通常通过给出的时，分，秒和毫秒数明确地，或者通过使用静态函数创建任一currentTime的（），它创建了一个QTIME表示该系统的本地时间目标。

trans-unit.source: A QToolButton instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个QToolButton实例。

trans-unit.source: A QTransform object can be built using the setMatrix(), scale(), rotate(), translate() and shear() functions. Alternatively, it can be built by applying basic matrix operations. The matrix can also be defined when constructed, and it can be reset to the identity matrix (the default) using the reset() function.
trans-unit.target: 甲QTransform对象可以使用内置setMatrix（），刻度（），旋转（），翻译（）和剪切（）函数。或者，可以通过应用基本矩阵运算来构建它。也可以在构造矩阵时对其进行定义，并可以使用reset（）函数将其重置为恒等矩阵（默认值）。

trans-unit.source: A QTransform object contains a 3 x 3 matrix. The m31 (dx) and m32 (dy) elements specify horizontal and vertical translation. The m11 and m22 elements specify horizontal and vertical scaling. The m21 and m12 elements specify horizontal and vertical
trans-unit.target: 一个QTransform对象包含一个3 x 3的矩阵。的 m31 （ dx ）和 m32 （ dy ）元素指定的水平和垂直平移。的 m11 和 m22 元素指定水平和垂直缩放。的 m21 和 m12 元素指定的水平和垂直

trans-unit.source: A QTreeView implements a tree representation of items from a model. This class is used to provide standard hierarchical lists that were previously provided by the QListView class, but using the more flexible approach provided by Qt's model/view architecture.
trans-unit.target: 一个QTreeView则实现了从模型项目的树表示。此类用于提供以前由 QListView 类提供的标准层次列表，但使用Qt的模型/视图体系结构提供的更灵活的方法。

trans-unit.source: A Replica is a light-weight proxy for the Source object, but a Replica supports the same connections and behavior of QObjects, which makes it usable in the same way as any other QObject that Qt provides. Behind the scenes, QtRO handles everything that's necessary for the Replica to look like its Source.
trans-unit.target: 甲副本是用于重量轻的代理源对象，而是一个副本支持相同的连接和的QObject的行为，这使得它以同样的方式作为任何其它可用的QObject该Qt提供。在后台，QtRO处理副本服务器看起来像其源代码所需的一切。

trans-unit.source: A QUndoCommand has an associated text(). This is a short string describing what the command does. It is used to update the text properties of the stack's undo and redo actions; see QUndoStack::createUndoAction() and QUndoStack::createRedoAction().
trans-unit.target: 甲QUndoCommand具有相关联的文本（）。这是描述命令功能的简短字符串。它用于更新堆栈的撤消和重做操作的文本属性。请参见QUndoStack :: createUndoAction（）和QUndoStack :: createRedoAction（）。

trans-unit.source: A QUndoCommand represents a single editing action on a document; for example, inserting or deleting a block of text in a text editor. QUndoCommand can apply a change to the document with redo() and undo the change with undo(). The implementations for these functions must be provided in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 甲QUndoCommand表示文件上的单个编辑动作; 例如，在文本编辑器中插入或删除文本块。QUndoCommand可以使用redo（）将更改应用到文档，并使用undo（）撤消更改。这些功能的实现必须在派生类中提供。

trans-unit.source: A QUndoGroup is also useful in conjunction with QUndoView. If a QUndoView is set to watch a group using QUndoView::setGroup(), it will update itself to display the active stack.
trans-unit.target: 甲QUndoGroup也与结合使用QUndoView。如果使用QUndoView :: setGroup（）将QUndoView设置为监视组，它将更新自身以显示活动堆栈。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing a null pointer (QMetaType::Nullptr).
trans-unit.target: 甲的QVariant含有一个空指针（QMetaType :: Nullptr）。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing a pointer to a type derived from QObject will also convert and return true for this function if a qobject_cast to the type described by
trans-unit.target: 甲的QVariant含有一个指向从派生的类型的QObject还将转换并用于该功能返回真，如果一个qobject_cast到该类型的所描述

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing a pointer to a type derived from QObject will also return true for this function if a qobject_cast to the template type T would succeed. Note that this only works for QObject subclasses which use the Q_OBJECT macro.
trans-unit.target: 如果对模板类型 T 的qobject_cast成功执行，则包含指向从QObject派生类型的指针的QVariant也将为此函数返回true 。请注意，这仅适用于使用Q_OBJECT宏的QObject子类。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing a pointer to a type derived from QObject will also return true for this function if a qobject_cast to the type described by
trans-unit.target: 甲的QVariant含有一个指向从派生的类型的QObject也将用于该功能返回真，如果一个qobject_cast到该类型的所描述

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing a pointer to the QObject.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含指向QObject的指针的QVariant。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing a sequential container will also return true for this function if the
trans-unit.target: 如果包含顺序容器的QVariant也将为此函数返回true

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing the date value (toDateTime()).
trans-unit.target: 甲的QVariant包含日期值（toDateTime（））。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing the regular expression value.
trans-unit.target: 甲的QVariant包含正则表达式值。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing the value of the boolean.
trans-unit.target: 甲的QVariant包含布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing the value of the number.
trans-unit.target: 甲的QVariant包含数字的值。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant containing the value of the string.
trans-unit.target: 甲的QVariant包含字符串的值。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant object holds a single value of a single type() at a time. (Some type()s are multi-valued, for example a string list.) You can find out what type, T, the variant holds, convert it to a different type using convert(), get its value using one of the toT() functions (e.g., toSize()) and check whether the type can be converted to a particular type using canConvert().
trans-unit.target: 一个QVariant对象一次拥有一个单一类型（）的单一值。（某些类型（）是多值的，例如一个字符串列表。）您可以找出哪种类型T（该变体可以保存），使用convert（）将其转换为其他类型，并使用toT之一获取其值。 （）函数（例如toSize（）），并检查是否可以使用canConvert（）将类型转换为特定类型。

trans-unit.source: A QVariant with a structure dependent on the type of extension.
trans-unit.target: 具有取决于扩展类型的结构的QVariant。

trans-unit.source: A QVariantList can be bound to an XQuery $variable. All the QVariants in the list must be of the same atomic type, and the $variable the variant list is bound to must be of that same atomic type. If the QVariants in the list are not all of the same atomic type, the XQuery behavior is undefined.

A QVariantList can be bound to an XQuery $variable. All the QVariants in the list must be of the same atomic type, and the $variable the variant list is bound to must be of that same atomic type. If the QVariants in the list are not all of the same atomic type, the XQuery behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 一个QVariantList可以绑定到XQuery $变量。列表中的所有QVariant必须具有相同的原子类型，并且变量列表绑定到的$ variable必须具有相同的原子类型。如果列表中的QVariant并非都具有相同的原子类型，则XQuery行为是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: A visible page must remain in the Active state.

A QWebEngineUrlRequestJob is given to QWebEngineUrlSchemeHandler::requestStarted() and must be handled by the derived implementations of the class. The job can be handled by calling either reply(), redirect(), or fail().
trans-unit.target: 甲QWebEngineUrlRequestJob给予QWebEngineUrlSchemeHandler :: requestStarted（），并且必须由类的派生出来的系统来处理。可以通过调用Reply（），redirect（）或fail（）来处理作业。

trans-unit.source: A QWebEngineUrlSchemeHandler can be registered for a profile by installUrlSchemeHandler() to add support for custom URL schemes. Requests for the scheme are then issued to QWebEngineUrlSchemeHandler::requestStarted() as QWebEngineUrlRequestJob objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个QWebEngineUrlSchemeHandler可以通过注册个人资料installUrlSchemeHandler（）来添加自定义URL方案的支持。然后，将对方案的请求作为QWebEngineUrlRequestJob对象发布到QWebEngineUrlSchemeHandler :: requestStarted（）。

trans-unit.source: A QWidget can have at most one of each action.
trans-unit.target: 一个QWidget最多可以包含每个动作之一。

trans-unit.source: A QWidget pointer to an instance of the custom widget, constructed with the parent supplied.
trans-unit.target: 甲QWidget的指针定制窗口小部件的实例，构造成具有提供的父。

trans-unit.source: A QWidget respects the safe area margins of a window by incorporating the margins into its contents' margins by default. This means, that a QLayout will use the content area of a widget for its layout, unless the Qt::WA_LayoutOnEntireRect attribute is set. This along with a contents margin of 0 can be used on the actual layout, to allow for example a background image to underlay the status bar and other system areas on an iOS device, while still allowing child widgets of that background to be inset based on the safe area.
trans-unit.target: 一个QWidget的默认由合并边缘到其内容的利润率尊重窗口的安全区边缘。这意味着，除非设置了Qt :: WA_LayoutOnEntireRect属性，否则QLayout将使用小部件的内容区域进行布局。可以在实际布局上使用此内容加上0的内容边距，以允许例如背景图像在iOS设备上的状态栏和其他系统区域上覆盖，同时仍允许基于该背景插入该背景的子小部件安全区域。

trans-unit.source: A QWidget should only have one of each action and adding an action it already has will not cause the same action to be in the widget twice.
trans-unit.target: 一个QWidget只能有一个动作，添加一个已经存在的动作不会导致相同的动作在小部件中出现两次。

trans-unit.source: A QWidget should only have one of each action.
trans-unit.target: 一个QWidget应该只有一个动作。

trans-unit.source: A QWindow created with the QSurface::OpenGLSurface can be used in combination with QPainter and QOpenGLPaintDevice to have OpenGL hardware accelerated 2D graphics, by sacrificing some of the visual quality.
trans-unit.target: 甲QWindow与所创建的QSurface :: OpenGLSurface可与结合使用的QPainter和QOpenGLPaintDevice具有OpenGL硬件加速的2D图形，通过牺牲一些视觉质量的。

trans-unit.source: A QWindow created with the surface type QSurface::RasterSurface can be used in combination with QBackingStore and QPainter, Qt's highly optimized 2D vector graphics API. QPainter supports drawing lines, polygons, vector paths, images and text. For more information, see Paint System and Raster Window Example.

A QWindow created with the surface type QSurface::RasterSurface can be used in combination with QBackingStore and QPainter, Qt's highly optimized 2D vector graphics API. QPainter supports drawing lines, polygons, vector paths, images and text. For more information, see Paint System and Raster Window Example.
trans-unit.target: 甲QWindow与表面类型创建QSurface :: RasterSurface可与组合使用QBackingStore和QPainter的，Qt的高度优化的2D矢量图形API。QPainter支持绘制线条，多边形，矢量路径，图像和文本。有关更多信息，请参见“ 绘制系统和栅格窗口示例”。

trans-unit.source: A modal dialog is a dialog that blocks input to other visible windows in the same application. Dialogs that are used to request a file name from the user or that are used to set application preferences are usually modal. Dialogs can be application modal (the default) or window modal.
trans-unit.target: 甲模态对话框是一个对话框，输入到其他可见窗口在同一应用程序块。用于向用户请求文件名或用于设置应用程序首选项的对话框通常是模式对话框。对话框可以是应用程序模式（默认）或窗口模式。

trans-unit.source: A modeless dialog is a dialog that operates independently of other windows in the same application. Find and replace dialogs in word-processors are often modeless to allow the user to interact with both the application's main window and with the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 阿非模态对话框的是，在相同的应用程序独立于其他窗口的操作的对话框。在文字处理器中查找和替换对话框通常是无模式的，以允许用户与应用程序的主窗口和对话框进行交互。

trans-unit.source: A .dic file that is a dictionary containing words for the language
trans-unit.target: 一个 .dic 文件是包含字语字典

trans-unit.source: A CreateProcessArgumentModifier function takes one parameter: a pointer to a CreateProcessArguments struct. The members of this struct will be passed to CreateProcess after the CreateProcessArgumentModifier function is called.
trans-unit.target: 甲 CreateProcessArgumentModifier 函数采用一个参数：一个指向 CreateProcessArguments 结构。调用 CreateProcessArgumentModifier 函数后，此结构的成员将传递给 CreateProcess 。

trans-unit.source: A MEMBER variable association is required if no READ accessor function is specified. This makes the given member variable readable and writable without the need of creating READ and WRITE accessor functions. It's still possible to use READ or WRITE accessor functions in addition to MEMBER variable association (but not both), if you need to control the variable access.
trans-unit.target: 甲 MEMBER 如果没有变量关联需要 READ 指定存取功能。这使给定的成员变量可读写，而无需创建 READ 和 WRITE 访问器函数。如果需要控制变量访问，除了 MEMBER 变量关联（但不能同时使用两者）之外，仍然可以使用 READ 或 WRITE 访问器函数。

trans-unit.source: A Mac0 map as specified by RFC 8152 (CBOR Object Signing and Encryption).
trans-unit.target: 甲 Mac0 映射为通过指定的RFC 8152（CBOR对象签名和加密）。

trans-unit.source: A Mac map as specified by RFC 8152 (CBOR Object Signing and Encryption).
trans-unit.target: 一个 Mac 地图由指定的RFC 8152（CBOR对象签名和加密）。

trans-unit.source: A Message object, which will be the
trans-unit.target: 一个 Message 对象，它将是

trans-unit.source: A NOTIFY signal is optional. If defined, it should specify one existing signal in that class that is emitted whenever the value of the property changes. NOTIFY signals for MEMBER variables must take zero or one parameter, which must be of the same type as the property. The parameter will take the new value of the property. The NOTIFY signal should only be emitted when the property has really been changed, to avoid bindings being unnecessarily re-evaluated in QML, for example. Qt emits automatically that signal when needed for MEMBER properties that do not have an explicit setter.
trans-unit.target: 甲 NOTIFY 信号是可选的。如果定义，则应在该类中指定一个现有信号，只要该属性的值发生更改，该信号就会发出。 MEMBER 变量的 NOTIFY 信号必须采用零或一个参数，该参数必须与属性具有相同的类型。该参数将采用属性的新值。例如，仅当属性确实已更改时才应发出 NOTIFY 信号，以避免不必要地在QML中重新评估绑定。对于没有显式设置程序的MEMBER属性，Qt会自动发出该信号。

trans-unit.source: A READ accessor function is required if no MEMBER variable was specified. It is for reading the property value. Ideally, a const function is used for this purpose, and it must return either the property's type or a const reference to that type. e.g., QWidget::focus is a read-only property with READ function, QWidget::hasFocus().
trans-unit.target: 甲 READ 如果没有需要存取函数 MEMBER 被指定的变量。用于读取属性值。理想情况下，为此使用const函数，它必须返回属性的类型或对该类型的const引用。例如，QWidget :: focus是具有 READ 函数QWidget :: hasFocus（）的只读属性。

trans-unit.source: A RESET function is optional. It is for setting the property back to its context specific default value. e.g., QWidget::cursor has the typical READ and WRITE functions, QWidget::cursor() and QWidget::setCursor(), and it also has a RESET function, QWidget::unsetCursor(), since no call to QWidget::setCursor() can mean
trans-unit.target: 一个 RESET 功能是可选的。用于将属性设置回其上下文特定的默认值。例如，QWidget :: cursor具有典型的 READ 和 WRITE 函数QWidget :: cursor（）和QWidget :: setCursor（），并且还具有 RESET 函数QWidget :: unsetCursor（），因为没有调用QWidget :: setCursor（）可以表示

trans-unit.source: A REVISION number is optional. If included, it defines the property and its notifier signal to be used in a particular revision of the API (usually for exposure to QML). If not included, it defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 一个 REVISION 号是可选的。如果包含，则它定义将在API的特定版本中使用的属性及其通知程序信号（通常用于暴露于QML）。如果不包括，则默认为0。

trans-unit.source: A Sign1 map as specified by RFC 8152 (CBOR Object Signing and Encryption).
trans-unit.target: 甲 Sign1 映射为通过指定的RFC 8152（CBOR对象签名和加密）。

trans-unit.source: A Sign map as specified by RFC 8152 (CBOR Object Signing and Encryption).
trans-unit.target: 一个 Sign 由指定映射RFC 8152（CBOR对象签名和加密）。

trans-unit.source: A WRITE accessor function is optional. It is for setting the property value. It must return void and must take exactly one argument, either of the property's type or a pointer or reference to that type. e.g., QWidget::enabled has the WRITE function QWidget::setEnabled(). Read-only properties do not need WRITE functions. e.g., QWidget::focus has no WRITE function.
trans-unit.target: 一个 WRITE 访问功能是可选的。用于设置属性值。它必须返回void，并且必须正好采用一个参数，该参数可以是属性的类型或该类型的指针或引用。例如，QWidget :: enabled具有 WRITE 函数QWidget :: setEnabled（）。只读属性不需要 WRITE 函数。例如，QWidget :: focus没有 WRITE 功能。

trans-unit.source: A georectangle can never cross the poles.
trans-unit.target: 一个 georectangle 永远无法跨越两极。

trans-unit.source: A georectangle is considered invalid if the top-left or bottom-right coordinates are invalid or if the top-left coordinate is south of the bottom-right coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 一个 georectangle 如果左上角或右下角坐标无效被视为无效，或者如果左上角的坐标是南方的右下角坐标。

trans-unit.source: A list can only store QML objects, and cannot contain any basic type values. (To store basic types within a list, use the var type instead.)
A list can only store QML objects, and cannot contain any basic type values. (To store basic types within a list, use the var type instead.)
trans-unit.target: 一个 list 只能存储QML对象，而不能包含任何基本类型的值。（要在列表中存储基本类型，请改用var类型。）

trans-unit.source: A locale object.

A matrix4x4 type has sixteen values, each accessible via the properties m11 through m44 in QML (in row/column order). Values of this type can be composed with the Qt.matrix4x4() function. Each attribute in a matrix4x4 is stored as a real (single-precision on ARM, double-precision on x86).
trans-unit.target: 甲 matrix4x4 类型有16个值，通过属性每个可访问 m11 通过 m44 在QML（以行/列顺序）。可以使用Qt.matrix4x4（）函数来组成此类型的值。matrix4x4中的每个属性都存储为实数（在ARM上为单精度，在x86上为双精度）。

trans-unit.source: A quaternion type has scalar, x, y and z attributes.
trans-unit.target: 甲 quaternion 类型具有 scalar ， x ， y 和 z 属性。

trans-unit.source: A variant type property can also hold an image or pixmap. A variant which contains a QPixmap or QImage is known as a "scarce resource" and the declarative engine will attempt to automatically release such resources after evaluation of any JavaScript expression which requires one to be copied has completed.
trans-unit.target: 甲 variant 类型属性也可以容纳一个图像或像素映像。甲 variant ，其包含的QPixmap或QImage的被称为“稀缺资源”和公告引擎将尝试任何JavaScript表达这需要一个要复制已完成的评估后自动释放这些资源。

trans-unit.source: A vector2d type has x and y attributes, otherwise it is similar to the vector3d type. Please see the documentation about the vector3d type for more information.
trans-unit.target: 甲 vector2d 类型具有 x 和 y 属性，否则是类似 vector3d 类型。请参阅有关 vector3d 类型的文档以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: A vector4d type has x, y, z and w attributes, otherwise it is similar to the vector3d type. Please see the documentation about the vector3d type for more information.
trans-unit.target: 甲 vector4d 类型具有 x ， y ， z 和 w 属性，否则是类似 vector3d 类型。请参阅有关 vector3d 类型的文档以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: A Backtab occurred. The input for this may include the Shift or Control keys; e.g. Shift+Tab.
trans-unit.target: 发生了一个后标签。这时的输入可能包括Shift或Control键,如Shift+Tab。

trans-unit.source: A Behavior defines the default animation to be applied whenever a particular property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 行为定义了每当某个特定属性值发生变化时要应用的默认动画。

trans-unit.source: A Binary Space Partitioning tree is applied. All QGraphicsScene's item location algorithms are of an order close to logarithmic complexity, by making use of binary search. Adding, moving and removing items is logarithmic. This approach is best for static scenes (i.e., scenes where most items do not move).
trans-unit.target: 将应用二进制空间分区树。通过使用二进制搜索，所有QGraphicsScene的项目定位算法的数量级都接近对数复杂度。添加，移动和删除项目是对数的。此方法最适合静态场景（即，大多数项目不移动的场景）。

trans-unit.source: A Bluetooth Low Energy peripheral device can contain multiple services. In turn each service may include further services. This class represents a single service of the peripheral device and is created via QLowEnergyController::createServiceObject(). The type() indicates whether this service is a primary (top-level) service or whether the service is part of another service. Each service may contain one or more characteristics and each characteristic may contain descriptors. The resulting structure may look like the following diagram:

trans-unit.source: A BorderImage breaks a source image, specified using the source property, into 9 regions, as shown below:

A BorderImage is used to display the image, and it is given a size that is larger than the original image. Since the horizontalTileMode property is set to BorderImage.Stretch, the parts of image in regions 2 and 8 are stretched horizontally. Since the verticalTileMode property is set to BorderImage.Stretch, the parts of image in regions 4 and 6 are stretched vertically.
A BoundaryRule defines the range of values that a particular property is allowed to have. When an out-of-range value would otherwise be set, it applies "resistance" via an easing curve.
A C++ API for low-level access and control.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于低级访问和控制的C++API。

trans-unit.target: \ class命令记录了C ++类。

trans-unit.target: \ class命令记录了C ++类。该类的注释来自类注释的\ brief命令的参数。

trans-unit.source: A C++ class is documented with the \class command.
A C++ class is documented with the \class command. The annotation for the class is taken from the argument of the class comment's \brief command.

A C++ model class can be defined as a QStringList, a QVariantList, a QObjectList or a QAbstractItemModel. The first three are useful for exposing simpler datasets, while QAbstractItemModel provides a more flexible solution for more complex models.
trans-unit.target: C ++模型类可以定义为QStringList，QVariantList，QObjectList或QAbstractItemModel。前三个对公开更简单的数据集很有用，而QAbstractItemModel为更复杂的模型提供了更灵活的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: A CAN bus error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 发生CAN总线错误。

trans-unit.source: A CSS stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个CSS样式表。

trans-unit.source: A CSS-style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个CSS样式表。

trans-unit.source: A Camera is always necessary to view the content of a 3D scene. A camera defines how to project the content of a 3D scene into a 2D coordinate space, which can then be used on a 2D surface. When a camera is present in the scene it can be used to direct what is displayed in a View3D.
A CameraSelector can be used to select the camera, which is used by the FrameGraph when drawing the entities.

A CheckBox is an option button that can be toggled on (checked) or off (unchecked). Checkboxes are typically used to represent features in an application that can be enabled or disabled without affecting others.

A ColorDialog window is automatically transient for its parent window. So whether you declare the dialog inside an Item or inside a Window, the dialog will appear centered over the window containing the item, or over the Window that you declared.
A ColorDialogRequest is passed as an argument of the WebEngineView::colorDialogRequested signal. It is generated when a color picker dialog is requested. See HTML5 Color State.
A Column animate items using specific transitions when items are added to or moved within a Column.
trans-unit.target: 当项目被添加到列中或在列中移动时,列会使用特定的转换对项目进行动画。

trans-unit.source: A ComputeCommand is used to issue work for the compute shader. The compute shader is specified in the Material component of the same entity the ComputeCommand is added to. The workGroupX, workGroupY and workGroupZ properties specify the work group sizes for the compute shader invocation. DispatchCompute node needs to be present in the FrameGraph to actually issue the commands. The execution behavior of the compute command can be controlled with the run type property.
A Connections object creates a connection to a QML signal.
trans-unit.target: Connections对象创建了一个QML信号的连接。

trans-unit.source: A ContextMenuRequest is passed as an argument of the WebEngineView::contextMenuRequested signal. It provides further information about the context of the request. The position of the request origin can be found via the x and y properties.
A Controller Area Network (CAN) is a vehicle bus standard designed to allow microcontrollers and devices to communicate with each other in applications without a host computer.
trans-unit.target: 控制器区域网络(CAN)是一种车辆总线标准,旨在允许微控制器和设备在没有主机的情况下在应用中相互通信。

trans-unit.target: D-Bus变体类型可以包含任何类型，包括其他变体。它类似于Qt QVariant类型。

trans-unit.source: A DBus signal is emitted from one application and is received by all applications that are listening for that signal from that interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个DBus信号从一个应用程序发出,并被所有从该接口监听该信号的应用程序接收。

trans-unit.target: 一个DBus信号从一个应用程序发出,只有拥有目的地的应用程序才能接收到。

trans-unit.target: 一个DNS主机名条目;该条目包含证书有效的主机名条目。该条目可包含通配符。

trans-unit.target: 可以使用shutdown（）关闭DTLS连接。

A DelayButton being held down

A DepthTest type is used to enable depth testing with a given depth test function. The depth test enables writing fragment color values when the depth test passes, and reject fragments which fail the test. The depth test uses the depth function to test the fragments depth value to the value against z-buffer. If the underlying surface does not have z-buffer, the DepthTest does nothing.
A Dialog Without Auto-Connect
trans-unit.target: 没有自动连接的对话

trans-unit.source: A Dialog in English
trans-unit.target: 英语对话

trans-unit.source: A Dialog in French
trans-unit.target: 法语对话

trans-unit.source: A DispatchCompute allows work to be issued for the compute shader to run on the GPU. The workGroupX, workGroupY and workGroupZ properties specify the work group sizes for the compute shader invocation. ComputeCommand components need to be added to entities to instruct Qt3D to select the materials and geometry from the entities for the compute invocation. The work group sizes for the shader invocation will be the maximum of the work group sizes specified in DispatchCompute and ComputeCommand.

A Dithering type enables dithering. Dithering adds noise to the color values to randomize quantization error in order to prevent large scale patterns in the final image, such as banding. Dithering is most useful when rendering to a surface with low color bit depth, such as RGB565 or RGBA4444.
trans-unit.target: Dithering类型可以实现抖动。Dithering 将噪声添加到颜色值中,以随机量化误差,从而防止最终图像中的大尺度模式,如带状。当渲染到颜色位深较低的表面(如RGB565或RGBA4444)时,抖动是最有用的。

trans-unit.source: A DropArea is an invisible item which receives events when other items are dragged over it.

A FileDialog window is automatically transient for its parent window. So whether you declare the dialog inside an Item or inside a Window, the dialog will appear centered over the window containing the item, or over the Window that you declared.
A FileDialogRequest is passed as an argument of the WebEngineView::fileDialogRequested signal. It is generated when the file dialog is requested by the input element. See File Upload state.
A FilterKey is a storage type for filter key and value pair. Filter keys are used by Technique and RenderPass to specify at which stage of rendering the technique or the render pass is used.

A FontDialog window is automatically transient for its parent window. So whether you declare the dialog inside an Item or inside a Window, the dialog will appear centered over the window containing the item, or over the Window that you declared.
A FrameRateRange represents a range of frame rates as minimum and maximum rate. More...
A FrontFace sets the winding direction of the front facing polygons.

A FrustumCulling type enables frustum culling of the drawable entities based on the camera view and Geometry bounds of the entities. If FrustumCulling is present in the FrameGraph, only the entities whose Geometry bounds intersect with the camera frustum, i.e. the view of the camera, are drawn. If FrustumCulling is not present, all drawable entities will be drawn. The camera is selected by a CameraSelector frame graph node in the current hierarchy. Frustum culling can save a lot of GPU processing time when the rendered scene is complex.

A Geometry type is used to group a list of Attribute objects together to form a geometric shape Qt3D is able to render using GeometryRenderer. Special attribute can be set in order to calculate bounding volume of the shape.
trans-unit.target: Geometry类型用于将Attribute对象列表组合在一起，以形成Qt3D能够使用GeometryRenderer渲染的几何形状。可以设置特殊属性，以计算形状的边界体积。

trans-unit.source: A GeometryRenderer holds all the information necessary to draw a Geometry. A Geometry holds the coordinates of the geometry data - GeometryRenderer specifies how to interpret that data.

A Grid creates a grid of cells that is large enough to hold all of its child items, and places these items in the cells from left to right and top to bottom. Each item is positioned at the top-left corner of its cell with position (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: 网格创建一个足够大的单元格,以容纳所有的子项,并将这些项从左到右、从上到下放置在单元格中。每个项都被放置在其单元格的左上角,位置为(0,0)。

trans-unit.source: A Grid defaults to four columns, and creates as many rows as are necessary to fit all of its child items. The number of rows and columns can be constrained by setting the rows and columns properties.
trans-unit.target: 网格默认为四列，并根据其所有子项创建所需的行数。可以通过设置行和列属性来限制行和列的数量。

trans-unit.source: A GridView displays data from models created from built-in QML types like ListModel and XmlListModel, or custom model classes defined in C++ that inherit from QAbstractListModel.

A GridView has a model, which defines the data to be displayed, and a delegate, which defines how the data should be displayed. Items in a GridView are laid out horizontally or vertically. Grid views are inherently flickable as GridView inherits from Flickable.
A HiFi audio device.
trans-unit.target: 一种HiFi音频设备。
